page.title: 04Farming.
page.content: The farms in the block are mainly independent dairy farms of approx 200 acres, with dairy herds of 80 to 200 friesian cows N.B. (Not all the acres quoted fall within the block and some farms own land well outside the locality _. eg. Raydown Farm owns land in Potterne and Dunge farm has land at Edington.> A few farms have been broken up into small units and are owned by the council. Manor farm at the end of West Ashton village is one of these. Two farms are notably larger than the rest _ East Town Farm.approx 600 acres. and Fulling Bridge Farm approx 500 acres. Both farms are owned by business men with interests other than farming. East Town is the only completely arable farm in the block growing wheat,barley,rape and field beans.
